room_title: Escape room "Suzy's Cell" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: Immersive and fun!  The puzzles are clever and it was a pretty fun time.  It's not my favorite with this (great) company but still worth doing! :)

room_title: Escape room "Suzy's Cell" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: Suzy and The CabinDid these two rooms to add on as I enjoy the creativity and such that goes into these rooms. LOVED SUZY. The soundtrack was amazing for sure and added to all of the ambiance. The CABIN was creepy but well done and I applaud this place. I will be back for sure. Got my cousins into it...

room_title: Escape room "Suzy's Cell" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: Did suzys cell with some friends and it was the most fun experience ever!!! All rooms have a themed door and when you walk in the place you're already playing a game it's really neat. Rod helped with the booking and was so informative and upbeat he added to such a fun experience here. Coming back and trying all the rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Suzy's Cell" by Number One Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: This was a first for our group of four & we had no idea what to expect. We chose Suzy's cell, & ended up having a lot of fun! It took all 4 of us & the help of a few clues to get us out, but it was a great experience. Staff did a great job as well!
